author: Sam Meredith
title: Swiss pharma giant says it's 'too soon' to know whether malaria drug could be coronavirus vaccine
description: The CEO of Novartis has said it is "too soon" to know whether two anti-malaria drugs could be the definitive vaccine for the coronavirus.
content:
The chief executive of Novartis has cautioned that it is "too soon" to be sure whether two anti-malaria drugs could be the definitive vaccine for the coronavirus, after President Donald Trump touted them as a "game-changer" for the global outbreak.
